vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.1.10
§ Harbona or Harbonah = "ass-driver"
the 3rd of the seven chamberlains or eunuchs who served Ahasuerus
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈波拿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "趕驢的人"
亞哈隨魯王身旁的七個侍從或太監中的第三個
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈波拿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "赶驴的人"
亚哈随鲁王身旁的七个侍从或太监中的第三个

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.7.9
§ Harbona or Harbonah = "ass-driver"
the 3rd of the seven chamberlains or eunuchs who served Ahasuerus
